text: Ra kehi manisaharu yasta pani chan jasale mukhale bhandachan, ki hamile allahamathi astha rakhyaum. Tara jaba uniharula'i allahako batoma kunai kasta pugdacha ta manisaharuko kastala'i yasto thandachan jasto allahako sajaya hos ra yadi palanakartako tarphabata kunai sahayata pugdacha ta bhandachan, ki hami ta timra sathama thiyaum. Ke juna kuro sansaravalaharuko chatima cha, allaha tyasala'i jandaina
